titles: A proclamation, containing His Majesties grace and favour to His Subjects [in t]his His ancient kingdom of Scotland
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
publisher: printed by Andrew Anderson, printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,
notes: Steele notation: Arms 232  Lo- jects twenty.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Holy-rood-house the twenty fourth day of March, 1674. And of Our Reign the twenty sixth year.
